property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure: A parameter specifying default hyperlink to associate with icons in model. Putting this attribute into a model causes the icons of entities, attributes, or both, to be assigned a default hyperlink to the URI given by linkTarget. This will replace any configuration default link that includes the same objects, and targets the same instanceOf possibilities.

property.name: prop:height
property.configure: Parameter specifying the height of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 20.

property.name: prop:include
property.configure: Specification of whether to provide the link for Attributes, Entities, or both. This is either "Entities" (the default), "Attributes", or "All".

property.name: prop:width
property.configure: Parameter specifying the width of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 60.

property.name: prop:displayText
property.configure: Parameter giving the text to display in the Ptolemy model. This defaults to "Content for Export to Web".

property.name: prop:instancesOf
property.configure: If non-empty (the default), specifies a class name. Only entities or attributes (depending on include) implementing the specified class will be assigned the control defined by this DefaultIconLink parameter.

property.name: prop:linkTarget
property.configure:
Parameter specifying the target for the link. The possibilities are:
  • _lightbox: Open in a lightbox-style popup frame.
  • _blank: Open in a new window or tab.
  • _self: Open in the same frame as it was clicked.
  • _parent: Open in the parent frameset.
  • _top: Open in the full body of the window.
  • framename: Open in a named frame.
The default is "_lightbox".
